name: especially
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: very much; more than usual or more than other people or things

example.eg: She's not especially interested in sport.
example.egtrans: 她对体育运动不是特别感兴趣。

example.eg: I love Australian wines, especially the white wines.
example.egtrans: 我非常喜欢澳大利亚葡萄酒，尤其是白葡萄酒。

example.eg: I chose this especially for your new house.
example.egtrans: 我特地为你的新家挑选了这个。

example.eg: They invited her to speak especially because of her experience in inner cities.
example.egtrans: 他们邀请她来发言，主要是因为她有在旧城区生活的经历。
